title: 水桶服务器出现问题
author: ADOLFHITLER
txt_content: 我的水桶服务器出现file://C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\未命名.jpg这个问题，就是running on that port?就停了，请问咋办？还有我想打进去MOD咋鼓捣？

replies.author: sayway123
replies.txt_content:
截个图
才能对症下药

replies.author: ADOLFHITLER
replies.txt_content:
那个，我不知道咋网页截图，我打出来
就是到这里卡住了
perhaps a server is already running on that poet?
